Class ChatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChatClient

  • public class ChatClient
extends java.lang.Object
    ChatServer models a client in a Server-client architechture based chatting service. It will connect to the server at the starting time. Once connected there is no distinction between the server and client. It will send the user's name together with the message to the server and allow messages to be sent and received from server asynchronously.
